text: Jinan Metro Line 3 () is a rapid transit line in Jinan, China. The line use six-car Type B rolling stock. The line is long. It is completely underground. It was opened on 28 December 2019. ==Timeline== {| class="wikitable" style="border-collapse: collapse; text-align: right;" !Segment!!Opened!!Length!!Station(s)!!Name |- |style="text-align: left;"| Longdong — Tantou | 28 December 2019 | | 12 |style="text-align: left;"| Phase 1 |} ==Stations== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="2" | Station Name ! rowspan="2" | Connections ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" | Distance |- ! ! |- style = "background:#; height: 2pt" | colspan = "8" | |- | | | | | |- | | | | | |- | | | | | |- | | | | | |- | | | | | |- | | | | | |- | | | | | |- | | | (under construction) | | |- | | | | | |- || | | | | |-bgcolor="lightgrey" || | | | | |- | | | MDK | | |- || | | | | |- style = "background:#; height: 2pt" | colspan = "8" | |} ==Notes== ==References== Category:Jinan Metro Category:2019 establishments in China Category:Railway lines opened in 2019
title: Line 3 (Jinan Metro)
